document_data.image: City of the Dead-Trades Ward-Spindle Street.png
document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the House of the Homeless (labeled CD2) in the City of the Dead.
document_data.name: House of the Homeless
document_data.location: [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Homeless''' was a large mausoleum located within the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The House of the Homeless was located in the western section of the City of the Dead near the entryway.
document_data.Description: A row of small steps lead up to the mausoleum's tall metal gates and one of [[Anacaster]]'s magical portals. The portal lead to a endless maze of underground caverns. The [[Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters]] were paid to light the caverns.
document_data.History: The dead of Waterdeep were interred within the House of the Homeless if they died without laying claim, or payment, to any other burial site. Their names, if known at the time of death, were carved into the stone above the hole where their cremated ashes were laid to rest.
